response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we are confident it will be a valuable asset to you as well. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a significant discount, providing you with an unparalleled chance to secure such a high-value item at a competitive rate. We believe this offer presents an excellent investment opportunity that aligns well with your needs and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
